About me

I have excellent communication skills and good work habits able to work effectively alone, or in a team-based environment. I lead well with hands-on experience in leading and organizing teams for various volunteer works, as part of my passion.

I have a strong foundation in computer and software engineering, proficient in deploying and managing cloud services such as Amazon EC2. Skilled in scripting with Python and automations, with a working knowledge of Linux, SQL, Git, and PHP. Holds Cisco Networking Certifications and actively pursuing Google Cloud and AWS certifications.

Sample Projects


Sugarcane Variety Sorter and Image Classifier

CNN Deep Learning | Python | Embeded Systems | C++

A systems that identifies and sorts sugarcane billets according to its variety for optimization of yield. It integrates custom-built hardware with machine learning to classify and sort five sugarcane varieties. VGG16 Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) model is used and trained using transfer learning. The application and user interface uses Python, and C++ for microcontrollers and sensors.



Source Code

Employee Dashboard

Apps Script | Javascript | Bootstrap, HTML, CSS

A dashboard that can serve as a portal to the various services and resources of a company or organization. It is built on Google Apps Script and can be integrated with various automations among various Google workspace applications.

AWS Portfolio

Amazon Web Services EC2, Route 53, Linux

This website that acts as my portfolio is deployed from an AWS EC2 instance running on Linux operating system (Ubuntu 20.04). It is routed using AWS Route 53 service that manages domain registration, DNS routing, and health checking. Skills acquired are deployment of the website in a virtual server running on linux and development on Node.js



Source Code

Kaye Bakes Ordering System

Python | Image Processing | Hash Algorithm | PHP

This project is an orering system that integrates a reverse image search using image hash algorithm for the suggestion feature for the web store of a customized cake making shop. Skills acquired are programming in Python, PHP, HTML, CSS, and MySQL.
